container_group_name.title: Container Group Name
container_group_name.description: Must be 2-63 lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens. Cannot start with a number or start or end with a hyphen.

networking_auth.title: Require Container Gateway Authentication
networking_auth.description: When enabled, requests must include a SaladCloud API Key. When disabled, any anonymous request will be allowed.

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: The name of the model to use, from the ollama library.
